article_title: Our Opinion: Endorsements for U.S. Senate, state treasurer, circuit judge
article_text:
By The Editorial Board

The State Journal-Register

Posted Mar. 5, 2014 at 3:00 AM

Updated Mar 5, 2014 at 7:23 AM

article_metadata.description: The State Journal-Register editorial board endorses the following candidates in Republican primaries: Jim Oberweis for U.S. Senate, Bob Grogan for state treasurer and John "Mo" Madonia for circuit judge.
article_metadata.author: The Editorial Board The State Journal-Register

og.description: The State Journal-Register editorial board endorses the following candidates in Republican primaries: Jim Oberweis for U.S. Senate, Bob Grogan for state
